formalpara.title: Figure 2. Variations in meiosis and polar body (PB) formation
formalpara.para: Epifluorescence visualizing DAPI-stained nuclei. a, C. elegans, 1-cell embryo prior to fusion of pronuclei; two PBs have been extruded at the anterior pole as the result of two consecutive meiotic divisions; b, D. coronatus, 2-cell stage, one PB present; insert: 2-cell embryo after division of the single PB; c, A. nanus, 3-cell stage, one PB present; d, Plectus sp. (ES 601) 1-cell stage with two PBs produced in two meiotic divisions. Scale bar, 10 μm.
